alice.tuprolog

Class Number

  • java.lang.Object
    • alice.tuprolog.Term
      • alice.tuprolog.Number
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<Number>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    Double, Float, Int, Long

    public abstract class Number
extends Term
implements java.lang.Comparable<Number>
    Number abstract class represents numbers prolog data type
    See Also:
    Int, Long, Float, Reviewed by Paolo Contessi: implements Comparable, Serialized Form

      • copy

        Term copy(java.util.AbstractMap<Var,Var> vMap,
        int idExecCtx)
        gets a copy (with renamed variables) of the term.

        the list argument passed contains the list of variables to be renamed (if empty list then no renaming)

        Specified by:
        copy in class Term
        idExecCtx - Execution Context identifier

      • resolveTerm

        long resolveTerm(long count)
        Description copied from class: Term
        Resolves variables inside the term, starting from a specific time count. If the variables has been already resolved, no renaming is done.
        Specified by:
        resolveTerm in class Term
        Parameters:
        count - new starting time count for resolving process
        Returns:
        the new time count, after resolving process
